segments.text: What can I do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a bath .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to have a tub bath , surfing bath or shower ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . The fitting room is over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 100 . But we will charge you $ 200 as a deposit .
segments.speaker: S1
